description: Manage the Microsoft Teams Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot msteams create
commands.summary: Create the Microsoft Teams Channel on a bot.
commands.syntax:
az bot msteams create --name
                      --resource-group
                      [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                      [--calling-web-hook]
                      [--enable-calling {false, true}]
                      [--location]
examples:
az bot msteams create -n botName -g MyResourceGroup --enable-calling
--calling-web-hook https://www.myapp.com/

commands.name: az bot msteams delete
commands.summary: Delete the Microsoft Teams Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot msteams show
commands.summary: Get details of the Microsoft Teams Channel on a bot.
